datafu.pig.hash.lsh.metric

Class Cosine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>
      • datafu.pig.hash.lsh.metric.MetricUDF
        • datafu.pig.hash.lsh.metric.Cosine

  • public class Cosine
extends MetricUDF
    A UDF used to find a vector v in a bag such that for query point q, metric m and threshold t m(v,q) < t. In other words, find the first vector in the bag within a threshold distance away. It returns one of the tuples of the bag of vectors. The metric used is Cosine Similarity, which technically does not form a metric, but I'm stretching the definition here.
    See Also:
    CosineDistanceHash for an example
